questions.question: Do you see us all together as a civilization as a kind of intelligent system?
How do we set ourselves up in a place where we're going to be able to survive as a species?
What's your intuition about how hard is it to keep AI development on the positive track?
And you start thinking about just like, how do you have a world where this goes well?
And the place you got to start is to really align on what is it that we stand for, right?
And there I think that the answer looks a lot like, well, how does any company's values get actualized, right?
But if you think at the specifics here at first, what are some negative effects that you envisioned?
And you can ask it to generate content for you on basically any topic, right?
Why is it so important on the internet, do you think, to interact with only human beings?
Where do you see the field of deep learning heading in the next few years?
In terms of reasoning, super exciting topic, what kind of benchmarks, what kind of tests of reasoning do you envision?
So do you have a hope for reinforcement, for the future of reinforcement learning and for the future of simulation?
So the non-grand answer is just to look at, you know, what are we already making work?
